text: 2:9 Rom 2:17; 2 Korin 11:14-15; 1 Timoti 6:18; Jems 2:5; Akar Mogomem 3:9Kɨ osɨmtɨziba ko mɨzazir ia bativiziba ko biziba bar puvatɨzir arazim gɨfo. Ezɨ puvatɨ. Ia guizbangɨra bizir bar avɨriba iti. Kɨ fo, gumazamizir maba gɨrakɨrangɨn akar kurabar ia mɨgɨa ghaze, me Judan adarasi. Ezɨ me Judan adarazi puvatɨ. Me guizɨn Satanɨn adarasi.2:9 Smernan siosɨn gumazamiziba, me nguazir kamɨn biziba bar otevegha, onganarazibagh ami. Egha me Godɨn Duamɨn biziba, guizbangɨra bar izɨfa.
